title: [Health] A new study of over 3000 people led by Kingâ€™s College London in collaboration with Lund University, has shown for the first time that a single biomarker can accurately indicate the presence of underlying neurodegeneration in people with cognitive issues

[Health] Globally in 2019, 1.14 billion individuals were current smokers, who consumed 7.41 trillion cigarette-equivalents of tobacco. All that accounted for 7.69 million deaths and 200 million disability-adjusted life-years.
